description:
Yoshino`s childhood friend and editor Hatori confesses his love to him.
But Yoshino suspects that his friend and chief assistant Yanase is actually secretly in love with Hatori.
Yoshino`s so preoccupied with the relationship between those two that he can`t focus on his work...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go to The Sea, if You Would Fish Well.
Go to The Sea, if You Would Fish Well.
